sentence: In early trading on Friday, shares of Intel topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 0.3%.
Year to date, Intel registers a 3.8% gain.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Caterpillar trading down 1.8%.
Caterpillar is showing a gain of 2.8% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are Goldman Sachs Group, trading down 1.7%, and Procter & Gamble, trading up 0.2% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
